value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI. value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible

value.title: Calculate Break time between two consecutive Group by Rows in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will learn how we can calculate break time in Power BI. We have a real-life scenario where we have In-Out time pair for each employee throughout the day.  In order to calculate break time, we need to find difference between First Pair’s End time and Next Pair’s Start time. So, here
